sentences.sentence: Most of the time, she is bossy and pushy.
sentences.translation: 大多数时候，她都是专横、固执的。

sentences.sentence: Tears conquer the face of the bossy head nurse.
sentences.translation: 专横的护士长的脸上滑落点点泪珠。

sentences.sentence: If you weren't so bossy, I wouldn't have done that!
sentences.translation: 如果你不是那么专横，我就不会那样做了！
